data.author: GolfJet
data.description:
Play like a Pro: Professional golfers change their golf ball every hole to ensure uncompromised performance. GolfJet was created to empower our customers to play with this same spirit - to play like a pro!

Use this Pebble app with the GolfJet Connect mobile phone app to get quick distances to the green.

The GolfJet Connect App Connects members with each other, over 28,000 of the world’s best golf courses, tracks your slope adjusted handicap, stats and more.

Play, Review, Share, Earn. And Win.
- GPS Range Finder
- Invite friends to join your tour
- Over 28,000 golf courses and growing
- Stableford & Slope Handicap Calculation
- Statistics Dashboard
- Earn Rewards and Redeem in Shop


A GolfJet membership includes access to our tour level golf products and the GolfJet Connect app, with free home delivery, at a price point that’s accessible to everyone. 

GolfJet’s products have been engineered and rigorously benchmarked to deliver the performance demanded by over 85% of the world’s professional golfers so you can be sure GolfJet will help you play like a pro!  

GolfJet products are packaged in a handcrafted box; aptly named a JetPack. Members personalised Jetpacks includes a set of JET series golf balls (option for 9 or 12), the AirGrip supersoft cabretta leather glove, a set of Blade custom tees and a golden ball marker – all exclusively designed by GolfJet.
data.title: GolfJet Connect
